channel.title: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Question about Super Vs Silver potion"

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded: dont be so rude he just wanted to be nice :p

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded: Dude. Read the dates on threads before you answer them. If over a year has passed since the last post then it's quite likely the question has lost it's relevance.

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded:
Silver Elixer costs 40 Apitite with lelouch+CiCi bonus.
Super potion costs 130 apitite for +100 stamina
4*3=120
You can have four silver elixers with 10 apitite left over for every ten super potions.
+100,000 +100,000 +100,000 daily XP + 1/4th of a silver elixer's 'worth' that we'll guesstimate at 25,00 for silver elixers per +100 stamina for super.
So if you can get more then 325,000 Daily XP on +100 Stamina go for it

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded:
Never checked daily. Checked after mission totals.

It's now mood point.

JXP now doesn't work.

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded: Gogolu, were you looking just at the JutsuXP earned, or did you look to see if the JutsuXP earnt matched the increase in your daily XP in the ()s beside the JutsuXP?

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded:
I used it for my Jonin run a week ago.

And got 13k on B rank double attribute. I don't think without 2x it would be as much.

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded: Right. Now Teacher's Pet will not work and we will have to do with 10% from Flip Out.

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded: Hmm yeah Gogolu your right to an extent.

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded: Teacher's Pet doesn't count for ranking XP (flip out does).

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded:
After new changes panda is no longer working and you will have to work harder or get team with Stalkergirl or Mr Tea.

Obsessive Insight is also must now.

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded:
With super potion you will have bonus 10 missions(100stamina). +1 mission from +10 stamina from Pinky from 10x1 stamina. In total 11 missions.

With theme Teacher's Pet (x2 xp) it will give you 12-14k xp per double attribute B rank mission.(Counting standard Aura of Experience/Letter of Marque, Captain's Jacket, Shortbunny and Timmy, Panda and Pinky)

It means super potion will give you opportunity for 150k xp. One and half of Silver Elixir. All this counting on smoke-bombing for double attribute missions.

Silver Elixir is on other hand sure thing, no gambling.

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded: K I'll start it tomorrow I guess.

item.title: Re: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded: Silver elixir works for the Jonin exam. If you've already done the math and figured out that you get less than 100k XP for 100 stamina, than go with the silver elixir.

item.title: Question about Super Vs Silver potion
item.content:encoded:
Ok super gives 100 stamina

silver gives 100k daily EXP.

Ok i do b ranked nin missions and get like 5k XP or so per mission.

Now what im wondering is will the 100 extra stamina give me MORE xp (if i win ever mission) or will the silver potion give me more overall xp?

Since i could only get 50k exp per every 100 stamina.

This is a question for the Jonin Test season 2

the silver is better over all but does it even work for the test? I can only use 1. so I think ill go with the silver if it works on the test.
